dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT 'XX_AS_LEAD_IMP_OSR_STG' AS TABLE_NAME,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DOES_EXIST FROM all_tables ALT WHERE ALT.table_name = 'XX_AS_LEAD_IMP_OSR_STG' AND ALT.owner = 'XXCRM'

SELECT 'XX_AS_LEAD_IMP_OSR_STG_U1' AS INDEX_NAME,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DOES_EXIST FROM all_indexes ALI WHERE ALI.index_name = 'XX_AS_LEAD_IMP_OSR_STG_U1' AND ALI.owner = 'XXCRM' AND ALI.status = 'VALID'
SELECT 'XX_AS_LEAD_IMP_OSR_STG' AS SYNONYM_NAME,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DOES_EXIST FROM all_synonyms ALS WHERE ALS.synonym_name = 'XX_AS_LEAD_IMP_OSR_STG' AND ALS.owner = 'APPS'

SELECT 'OD: Show Debug Messages for Sales Lead Interface' AS PROFILE_NAME,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DOES_EXIST FROM fnd_profile_options_tl FPO WHERE FPO.profile_option_name = 'XX_LEADS_IMPORT_DEBUG'

SELECT 'Package Specification' AS Type,'XX_SFA_LEADS_PKG.pks' as Package_Name,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DOES_EXIST FROM dba_objects DBO WHERE DBO.object_name = 'XX_SFA_LEADS_PKG' AND DBO.object_type = 'PACKAGE' AND DBO.status = 'VALID' AND DBO.owner = 'APPS' UNION SELECT 'Package Body' AS Type,'XX_SFA_LEADS_PKG.pkb' as Package_Name,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DOES_EXIST FROM dba_objects DBO WHERE DBO.object_name = 'XX_SFA_LEADS_PKG' AND DBO.object_type = 'PACKAGE BODY' AND DBO.status = 'VALID' AND DBO.owner = 'APPS'

SELECT 'OD: SFA Import Sales Leads Inbound' AS CONCURRENT_PROGRAM,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DOES_EXIST FROM fnd_concurrent_programs FCP WHERE FCP.concurrent_program_name = 'XXSFALEADSINT' AND FCP.enabled_flag = 'Y' UNION SELECT 'Import Sales Leads' AS CONCURRENT_PROGRAM,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DOES_EXIST FROM fnd_concurrent_programs FCP WHERE FCP.concurrent_program_name = 'ASXSLIMP' AND FCP.enabled_flag = 'Y'
